name: Full Remote Technical Inspection Checklist
description: Comprehensive remote inspection checklist for drone systems using still images from 8-camera cube setup

metadata.author: Oliver Wallin
metadata.assumptions: Batteries already swapped and charging. MedKit is mounted. No one enters hangar during RemoteTI. All 8 camera images must be clear and of good quality.

tasks.title: START CONDITIONS: Verify prerequisites
tasks.description: Confirm all prerequisites for remote inspection are met.
instructions: Confirm RemoteTI procedure is being used.
Check all 8 camera images are captured with good quality.
Confirm no personnel visible in hangar.

tasks.title: CAMERA COVERAGE: Verify visual coverage
tasks.description: Confirm critical areas are visible in captured images.
instructions: Verify drone visible from opposite corners.
STOP if critical areas not visible.

tasks.title: SKYBASE SAFETY: Environment and obstacle check
tasks.description: Inspect Skybase environment for safety hazards and foreign objects.
instructions: Scan floor for debris/tools in images.
Verify marker is clean and visible.

tasks.title: UMBILICAL: Power connection and contact surfaces
tasks.description: Inspect umbilical connection and contact surfaces.

tasks.title: PARACHUTE SYSTEM: Complete PRS inspection
tasks.description: Inspect entire parachute recovery system for proper condition.
instructions: Check yellow lid seating and gaps.
Verify fuse switch and red cap.

tasks.title: DRONE STRUCTURE: Arms, core, and landing gear
tasks.description: Inspect drone structural components for integrity.
instructions: Inspect each motor arm for damage.

tasks.title: SENSORS: Navigation and vision systems
tasks.description: Inspect sensor systems for proper condition.
instructions: Look for physical damage to housings.

tasks.title: ANTENNAS: Communication systems
instructions: Verify GPS masts intact and forward-facing.

tasks.title: PORTS & PERIPHERALS: Protective covers and accessories
instructions: Verify Ethernet and USB caps installed.
Confirm all ports have protective covers.
Locate downlight on front-right landing gear.

tasks.title: MARKINGS: Regulatory and identification
tasks.description: Verify all required markings are visible.
instructions: Locate permit number on rear arm ('SWEbne...').
Verify Onyx name and airframeID correct.
Find AED alarm device warning sticker.

tasks.title: MEDKIT & WINCH: Payload system verification
tasks.description: Verify MedKit and winch system configuration.

tasks.title: DRONE STATUS: Verify safe state
tasks.description: Confirm drone is in expected safe state.
instructions: Verify drone stable on landing gear.
STOP if red lights or unexpected pattern.

tasks.title: ALIGNMENT: Marker positioning
tasks.description: Verify drone alignment with navigation marker.
instructions: Check drone centered on navigation marker.
Verify body parallel with marker lines.
Confirm landing legs symmetric to marker.

tasks.title: BATTERY: Compartment inspection
instructions: Verify battery compartment lid completely closed.
Check 4 screws secured (2 on each side).
Ensure no gaps between lids and core.
Verify white seal visible and intact if observable.
